statements: DELETE FROM real_estate_assets WHERE location = 'New York' AND num_bedrooms > 3;
DELETE FROM real_estate_assets WHERE asset_id = 101 AND location = 'New York'
DELETE FROM real_estate_assets WHERE num_bedrooms > 3 AND asset_type = 'House'
DELETE FROM Location WHERE city = 'Los Angeles'
DELETE FROM AssetOwner WHERE owner_id = 10 AND owner_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM asset_ratings WHERE asset_id = 100 AND rating > 4.5;
DELETE FROM property_reviews WHERE review LIKE '%bad%' AND property_id = 5;
DELETE FROM asset_owners WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
